pl-ex: [0] is in exalted in [1] sign, can expect promising results
pl-mo: [0] is in mooltrikona position in [1] sign, which is the second strongest position, can expect promising results
pl-ow: [0] is in own sign [1], the results are promising
pl-fr: [0] is in friendly sign [1] which is good
pl-en: [0] is in enemy sign [1], hence the planet may be weak in producing the expected results, but if its enemy is weak this gets nullified.
pl-db: [0] is debilitated in [1] which is considered as weakest position. The results may not be promising, but depending on the characteristics emmitted by the planet, sometimes this position is said to produce less harm than good.
